import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import CafeNav from './../CafeNav' import './homeStyles.css' import blackcrockery from './images/blackcrockery.png' import knifEorange from './images/knifEorange.jpeg' const Home = () => { useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('scroll',function() { const header=document.querySelector('header'); const image=document.getElementById('img-logo'); header.classList.toggle('sticky',window.scrollY>0); if(header.classList.container('sticky')) { image.src=knifEorange } }) }, []) return (
